summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 9 and 10, Front Street Cable Addition, being the alley from McCraw Street to Smith Street, between 1st Avenue North and Queen Anne Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9139 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
